DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct Europe . The aim study investigate self-reported impact Vagifem® ( estradiol ) treatment urogenital discomfort woman atrophic vaginitis due oestrogen deficiency .
DOC.brief_title: Vagifem® Used Treatment Atrophic Vaginitis Due Oestrogen Deficiency
DOC.criteria: Atrophic vaginitis due estrogen deficiency Postmenopausal
